channel.title: regression on The Delphi Blog
channel.description: Recent content in regression on The Delphi Blog

item.title: Template Post
item.description: Each blog post is an R Markdown document. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. The first paragraph or so will appear on the front page; by default the first 70 words are used, but you should instead write the first paragraph so it can serve as a summary, and mark the split point yourself like this:
